greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = [x^n] Sum_{k>=0} x^k/Product_{j=1..k} (1 - n*j*x).
link: Muniru A Asiru, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..101
mathematica: Table[SeriesCoefficient[Sum[x^k/Product[(1 - n j x), {j, 1, k}], {k, 0, n}], {x, 0, n}], {n, 0, 19}]
Join[{1}, Table[Sum[n^(n - k) StirlingS2[n, k], {k, 0, n}], {n, 19}]]
program: (PARI) a(n) = sum(k=0, n, n^(n-k)*stirling(n, k, 2)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Mar 23 2018
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Mar 20 2018
